name: Inclusive Design Principles
description:
Inclusivity is a design opportunity, and an essential part of the design process is ensuring weâ€™re designing for more people than just ourselves. Inclusion starts with being aware of those that might have challenges accessing your app or use it differently, and extends all the way to you remaining cognizant of how your app portrays people.


Idea and content has been inspired by https://inclusivedesignprinciples.org/.
